body.name: Secret Clinical Strength Soft Solid Antiperspirant and Deodorant, Light and Fresh Scent, 1.6 Ounce (Pack of 3)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 33 mins
features: Soft Solid and Smooth Solid are the same soft creamy formula, these names are used interchangeably by Secret
48 hours of prescription-strength odor control and wetness protection
Clinically stress-tested and formulated with 4X the stress-sweat protection*
With an all day Light and Fresh Scent
Secret Clinical Strength is the #1 selling clinical antiperspirant brand
body.description: Did you know heat, activity, and stress can all cause you to sweat, and that stress sweat smells WORSE than other kinds of sweat? Stress sweat comes from a different gland—causing more bacteria and more odor. That's why Secret Clinical Strength Soft Solid is clinically stress-tested and formulated with 4X the stress-sweat protection* to help stop sweat and odor before they start. It absorbs odor while releasing scent, to keep you smelling clean and feeling dry. Enjoy all-day coverage with Secret Clinical Strength antiperspirant/deodorant – incredible protection, no matter what the day may bring. *Vs. the protection required of an ordinary antiperspirant.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I have searched and searched for a deodorant that worked well, was easy to apply, did not stink of some crazy aroma and was a good value. I finally found it! I could not be happier with the secret. It goes on smoothly, it does not smell, it works really well and the price is fabulous. I will never purchase another brand or style of deodorant. This is as good as it gets !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best underarm deodorant! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
reviews.reviewText: Ok folks!! I have sensitive skin and a sensitive smell.... this stuff is amazing! I decided to try it because I've tried a couple others in the clinical strength and this smell is by far the lightest and the best! I will definitely be buying this again! This also does not give my skin a rash like most others do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best on the market
reviews.reviewText: I sweat quite easily, both stress sweat and workout sweat. This is the only antiperspirant that allows me to not worry about smelling bad, even when I do sweat. Put it on at night before bed, and for extra protection, apply again in the morning. I didn't read that tip till almost a year after wearing it. Lol. SOFT SOLD is better in my opinion because it tends to transfer less to my clothes and absorbs better without a residue. Great for tank tops!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best so Far
reviews.reviewText: The only deodorant that doesn't cause sensitivity or itching, but its kind of pricey specially that I pay shipping fees as well which makes it expensive since its not available where I live.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2017
reviews.reviewText: This is the only deodorant that allows me to wear shirts in which you might be able to see sweat marks because it stops my excessive sweating. To me, it's worth paying the extra money for this. I also don't even always apply it at night and I never use quite as much as the directions say to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only shipped me 1
reviews.reviewText: I was supposed to get 3 pack and got 1 and paid $30!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for years
reviews.reviewText: This is a great deodorant and I have used it faithfully for many years now. After the initial getting used to putting deodorant on at night, I've never looked back. It's not a magic antiperspirant--if it's really warm or I'm really stressed I'll still sweat--but it's really effective and improves it significantly. The deodorant portion works great--even at the end of a long day when I haven't applied it for over 24 hours I still smell like a rose!
